Package com.hexaware.dao

Class VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IvirtualArtGallery
public class VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl extends Object implements IvirtualArtGallery
The `VirtualArtGalleryServiceImpl` class implements the `IVirtualArtGallery` interface and provides the functionality to manage a virtual art gallery.
